snippet: The agency will have to go much further than apologies for breaking into the Senate’s computers. Its culture needs an overhaul, too.
abstract: Editorial charges that Central Intelligence Agency will have to go much further than accountability and apologies for breaking into Senate's computers, where documents on agency's detention and torture program were stored; holds that its very core, and basic culture, needs a thorough overhaul.
lead_paragraph: The agency will have to go much further than apologies for breaking into the Senate’s computers. Its culture needs an overhaul, too.

headline.main: The C.I.A.’s Reckless Breach of Trust
headline.print_headline: The C.I.A.’s Reckless Breach of Trust
